channel.title: 317 Client new Damage
channel.description:
Hello, I got a Client. a 317 client. I did see it was possible on a 508 server/client. and i know its inside the client.java .
I want the new damage (x10) on my Client. that would be realy nice on PK.
Can anyone help me with this?
Thanks, Indo
